scripts.start: concurrently "npm run build --prefix client/root" "npm run build --prefix client/projects/calculator" "npm run build --prefix client/projects/dragndrop" "nodemon index.js"
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm i --prefix=client/root && npm run build --prefix=client/root && npm i --prefix=client/projects/calculator && npm run build --prefix=client/projects/calculator && npm i --prefix=client/projects/dragndrop && npm run build --prefix=client/projects/dragndrop
